description.author: Salesforce
text: Component that serves as an interactive Einstein Assistant panel, handling user input, sending messages, and displaying responses from an AI provider.

elements.name: assistantPanelContext
elements.description: Represents the context container for the assistant panel

elements.name: homeViewComponent
elements.description: Represents the home view component of the assistant panel

elements.name: headerSlotContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the named slot for the header
